name: Google Maps
description: Access location data, directions, and place details.
full_description: Provide your agent with geospatial capabilities. This server enables searching for places, getting directions, calculating distances, and retrieving detailed information about locations using Google Maps Platform APIs.

tools.name: maps_search_places
tools.description: Search for places by text query.

tools.name: maps_get_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a place.
